### What content is covered?
This quiz reviews the terms and concepts contained in Lesson 5, related to the field of paleoanthropology and what it tells us about the evolution and origin of modern humans our early prehistory.

### Quiz Environment
This quiz is not proctored, and there is no time limit. You may use the lecture slideshows, textbook, and any other online resources provided to help you answer the questions. __This quiz may only be taken once.__

### Availability
The Lesson 5 Quiz is available Friday through the end of the day, __*Tuesday*__.
